rows.label: qev095401_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, are you free to chat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev095401_SEL0011
rows.name: Stay and chat with Stella for a while.

rows.label: qev095401_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev095401_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain that you are busy right now.

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0002
rows.name:
All right, no problem. Drop by when your schedule
opens up though, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0003
rows.name: I have some important chitchat to toss your way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0004
rows.name:
New LA's pretty peaceful, yeah? Even with all the xenos
thrown into the mix.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I mean, you remember what it was like on Earth?
It's like there was no end to the conflicts.
War was just...everywhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0006
rows.name:
And not just between nations, but across race lines,
tribal lines, you name it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0007
rows.name:
Compared to that, humanity's made real progress,
don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev095401_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod and say that humans are maturing.

rows.label: qev095401_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev095401_SEL0041
rows.name: Point out that humans are still fighting xenoforms.

rows.label: qev095401_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev095401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Stella what she is getting at.

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0008
rows.name: Sadly, there are some who are still stuck in the past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0009
rows.name: Here, take a look at this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0010
rows.name: Oh, absolutely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Which actually brings me to my point.
Here, take a look at this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0012
rows.name: I'll stop beating around the bush. Here's the deal...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0013
rows.name:
It turns out that Director General Chausson has a very
hush-hush mission that I think you're perfect for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0014
rows.name:
You know how the Prone working for the Ganglion
come from the Cavern Clan, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0015
rows.name:
They're a different tribe than the Tree Clan guys here
in the city. Those Prone you can at least talk to,
but the Cavern Clan are a real bloodthirsty bunch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Anyway, turns out that the director general is interested
in the Cavern Clan's tech. Veeeery interested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Specifically, he wants to know how they're building all
these strongholds in areas overrun with indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0018
rows.name:
I need you to head to one of those sites and
investigate. Oh, and if necessary, you're clear to
terminate any resistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0019
rows.name: Good luck out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0028
rows.name:
A lot of BLADEs have lost their lives to those Cavern
Clan Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0029
rows.name:
So be careful! And if you decide it's getting too hairy
at any point during your investigation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Well then, I'll trust you to take appropriate action.
Good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0020
rows.name: Welcome back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0021
rows.name:
I don't think anyone expected things to go quite like
they did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0022
rows.name:
Even the director general was speechless,
and that never happens![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0023
rows.name: But he's approved the Cavern Clan's request for asylum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0024
rows.name:
He said he's eager to hear what they can tell us about
both the Ganglion and the Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0025
rows.name:
I'm sure things will be a bit difficult for them with the
Tree Clan here, but them's the breaks, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0026
rows.name:
They should still be able to find a better life in New LA
than they'd have with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095401_MSG0027
rows.name:
I hope your decision was the right oneâ€”for the city
AND for those Prone. But I guess only time will tell.[ST:wait ]
